item.title: Optimizing Amazon CloudWatch Insights Queries With Field Level Indexes for Efficient Log Analytics
item.description: Introduction to Amazon CloudWatch Logs Insights Amazon CloudWatch Logs Insights is a powerful tool designed to help developers, DevOps engineers, and cloud administrators extract actionable intelligence from their log data. Whether youâ€™re troubleshooting application errors, monitoring system health, or auditing security events, CloudWatch Logs Insights enables you to query logs in real time using a purpose-built query language. Query Methods: CloudWatch Logs Insights uses a SQL-like syntax with support for commands like:
